BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent

Class CDUseCaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent.CDUseCaseConnector

  • public class CDUseCaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for connecting classes to use cases.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CDUseCaseConnector(PlaceManager UCPlaces)
      Basic constructor, that will set use case places.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CDUseCaseConnector

        public CDUseCaseConnector(PlaceManager UCPlaces)
        Basic constructor, that will set use case places.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedModel

        public CoordinateModel getSelectedModel()
        Method for returning selected class. It will return object that was created and based on which new useCase object will be created.
        Returns:
        CoordinateModel selectedModel.

      • setSelectedModel

        public void setSelectedModel(CoordinateModel selectedModel)
        Set class based on which new object in use case will be created.
        Parameters:
        selectedModel - CoordinateModel selectedModel which is created, or eddited class.

      • getNewline

        public LineModel getNewline()
        Gettter for line that was created. Based on this line new join edge in useCase will be created.
        Returns:
        LineModel of class join edge.

      • setNewline

        public void setNewline(LineModel newline)
        Based on this line new join edge in useCase will be created.
        Parameters:
        newline - LineModel of class join edge.

      • getUcPlaces

        public PlaceManager getUcPlaces()
        Get manager which stores each useCase object.
        Returns:
        PlaceManager with all use cases, actors and jins between them.

      • createNewUseCaseObject

        public void createNewUseCaseObject(java.lang.String useCaseName)
        Method that creates new actor or use case from new class. It will check if type of class has been changed and if so, it will remove propriete use case from use case diagram and create new one. If new class was created create appropriate object in use case.
        Parameters:
        useCaseName - name of created use case

      • createNewUseCaseJoin

        public void createNewUseCaseJoin()
        Method for creating new joins between associated objects in use case.
